images.caption: Figure 1:Static Memory Used vs Validation Loss comparing the standard BF16, FP8 with Master weights (FP8 w/ MW) baselines with standard stochastic rounding (FP8 w/o MW + SR) and ECO. ECO with stochastic rounding (SR) provides a significantly better Pareto frontier. Gradient accumulation is disabled in all cases.

Figure 3:(Left) Gemma 3 1B and SMoE 2.1B validation loss comparison, and (Right) Smoothed training loss during fine-tuning of DeepSeek-MoE-16B-Base[deepseekmoe].
